code: import data from"../data/data.json";import avantage from"../data/avantages.json";export default function getItems(){return data.map(function(item){return{id:item.id,title:item.title,image:item.image,fabricant:item.fabricant};});}export var getItem=function getItem(id){return data.find(function(item){return item.title===id;});};export function getProduct(id){return data.find(function(item){return item.id===id;}).map(function(data){return data.modele;});}export function getAvantages(){return avantage.map(function(item){return{name:item.name,image:item.image,description:item.description};});}
